channel.title: I hate this. Really bad.. Help please, if possible
channel.description: When I try to set maxplayers to less than 200, and someone tries to log in, they cant... But when its set to 200 or higher, it works..

item.title: I hate this. Really bad.. Help please, if possible
item.dc:creator: @fedexer -fedexer-
item.description:
@fedexer wrote:

do this…

To properly set your player limit you need to set the connection limit… they are the same thing… to do this follow my instructions…

Step 1

Open up your server.java file

Step 2

Search for
Code:
MaxConnections
And you should see this
Code:
public static int MaxConnections = 25;

Step 3

Change the number in
Code:
public static int MaxConnections = 25;to the max number of players you want in your server…

Step 4

Compile and you are done…

creds to vbman… he just posted it in another thread

Read full topic

item.title: I hate this. Really bad.. Help please, if possible
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Well, also, it says out of bounds exception in the NPChandler… Which is

for (int j = 1; j < server.playerHandler.maxPlayers; j++) { if (server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { server.playerHandler.players[j].RebuildNPCList = true; } }
Lol.
